org.openqa.selenium.interactions

接口 HasInputDevices

  • 所有已知实现类:
    ChromeDriver, EdgeDriver, EventFiringWebDriver, FirefoxDriver, InternetExplorerDriver, OperaDriver, RemoteWebDriver, SafariDriver

    public interface HasInputDevices
    Interface implemented by each driver that allows access to the raw input devices.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法
